word: AFTER COMING TO THE SANITARIUM AT TAKOMA PARK, I RECEIVED COMMUNICATIONS FROM SISTER WHITE, DIRECTING ME AS TO HOW TO CARRY FORWARD THE WORK OF THE SANITARIUM, AND IN THE FIELD ALONG EDUCATIONAL LINES. IT MAY BE OF INTEREST TO LEARN HOW THE LORD OPENED THE WAY FOR ME TO LEAVE AUSTRALIA, A FIELD TO WHICH I FELT I WAS CALLED.
